Package Model

Class UnoGameTable

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.UnoGameTable
public class UnoGameTable extends Observable
The UnoGameTable represents the table of a Uno game match.
Provides all the methods to play Uno full-matches in different game-modes.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public ActionPerformResult startGame()
      Starts the game :
      1. shuffles the deck
      2. distributes the cards to each Player
      3. puts a Card on the discards
      4. performs the action associated to that Card
      Returns:
      the ActionPerformResult of the first card

    • performFirstCard

      public ActionPerformResult performFirstCard(Options parameters)
      Performs the action associated with the first Card put on the discards after shuffling the deck
      Parameters:
      parameters -
      Returns:
      the ActionPerformResult of the first card

      public boolean isExposable(int player)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
